reviews.comments: Todo muy bien, buena ubicación, zona tranquila para andar, el departamento tiene todo lo que necesitas, impecable , luminoso, y un balconcito muy agradable para tomarse unos matecitos.

La ubicación es excelente , para quien quiera disfrutar de Palermo Soho , y además muy buen punto para ir a otros lugares  . La seguridad es muy buena , lugar adecuado calidad precio , muy tranquilo . Muy recomendable
Muy lindo departamento ubicado en la mejor zona de palermo. Muy comodo , Claudia muy buena anfitriona.
Claudia es muy predispuesta a ayudar en la estadía!

La zona es muy segura y tranquila. De fácil acceso a medios de transporte.  A media cuadra del departamento hay una parada del Bus turístico. Zona muy segura y cuidada para movilizarse con tranquilidad hasta tarde. Encontramos gente muy amable, a Una cuadra encontramos una confitería  en donde el desayuno era con medialunas de elaboración propia y el yogurt casero. También se podía comer al mediodía, todo casero. Fue tan amable el dueño en dónde desayunábamos así que fuimos a despedirnos antes de viajar.
Hay montones de restaurantes, cafés y confiterías y negocios de ropa. Los domingos se hace una feria en la plaza del frente, pensamos volver cuando vayamos nuevamente  a Bs As
Genial todo!

Mi estadía fue de apenas dos noches pero el departamento es cálido y cómodo tal como se ve en las fotos. Su ubicación es excelente, en pleno Palermo Soho. Claudia es muy amable y atenta. Gracias por permitir dejar mi equipaje luego del check in. 
Para recomendar!!!
Excelente depto a metros del centro de Palermo Soho. Bien equipado, muy limpio y la dueña super amigable y muy predispuesta a hacer de la estadía lo más placentera posible.
Es la segunda vez que nos quedamos ! Nos sentimos como en casa! Excelente ubicación y seguridad! Volveremos
Excelente en todo sentido.atencion Comodidad el depto tal cual lo muestran las fotos .Super recomendable x calidad de atencion ubicacion resposabilidad Muchas gracias Claudia
Excelente estadía. Excelente ubicación perfecto para una pareja!
La ubicación excelente. Él Depto muy cómodo. La atención de Claudia muy cordial. Altamente recomendable

El edificio es muy seguro, el departamento es tal cual lo muestran las fotos, el equipamiento funciona perfectamente y la ubicación es inmejorable.
Claudia es muy accesible, amable y predispuesta, nuestra estadía fue excelente.
Muchas gracias!

Nuestra estadía fue excelente, Claudia es muy predispuesta y muy atenta, la veracidad de su descripción en 100%, y la ubicacion del departamento es perfecta, el barrio es muy lindo, seguro y es apto para caminar. El departamentop cuenta con los elementos necesarios, es muy limpio y muy bien climatizado. Muy recomendable, de seguro volveremos a hospedarnos
el depto esta muy bien hubicado, cerca de muchisimos bares y lugares para comer.... la  experiencia fue excelente ya que claudia es muy atenta y buena onda!!!!! super recomendable!
Claudia fue muy amable y atenta con nosotros.

El departamento esta bien ubicado, bien mantenido, aunque es un poco ruidoso.
Claudia es una muy buena anfitriona, muy servicial y cordial. 
Por otras experiencias, creo que le falta mejores utensillos de cocina, modernizar el televisisor, y algun equipo de audio.
Gracias igualmente y lo recomendaria
Muy lindo departamento, bien ubicado! Lo recomiendo!
Claudia es una excelente anfitriona. Su departamento es muy agradable y cómodo, en una gran zona. Muy recomendable.
Claudia tuvo un cálido recibimiento, nos dio la información necesaria para manejarnos dentro y fuera del departamento , todo fue muy sencillo !
Departamento muy confortable en una ubicación (URL HIDDEN) atención de Claudia fue excelente y nos sentimos como en casa. Seguramente volveremos!

Muy recomendable. Tanto Claudia como Miguel son personas muy atentas y han respondido prontamente todas las inquietudes. La ubicación es excelente y el departamento es tal cual se lo muestra en las fotografías. Lo tendremos en cuenta para futuros viajes a Bs As!!
reviews.response: Gracias Facundo ! ustedes fueron muy buenos huéspedes ,muy cuidadosos con todo ,recomendables 100% los espero cuando quieran volver

reviews.comments: La atención de Claudia fue muy cálida y servicial, con pequeños detalles que hicieron de nuestra estadía una muy buena experiencia. La ubicación del departamento es excelente, en un barrio hermoso, tranquilo y con buena disponibilidad de transporte publico. El departamento tiene todo lo necesario y esta en muy buenas condiciones. Lo voy a recomendar a todas las personas que viajen a Buenos Aires.
reviews.response: muchas gracias Pedro,fue muy lindo conocerlos ,espero que vuelvan pronto!!

reviews.comments: Location, location, location... Excelente ubicación, departamento sencillo pero muy funcional. Muy buen value for money.
Recomendado
El apartamento es muy cómodo y su ubicación privilegiada lo que permite mucha libertad a la hora de hacer planes. Cuenta con todo lo necesario para pasarla bien. Muy recomendable!!
El departamento esta super bien ubicado para quien gusta de Palermo Soho y tiene todo lo necesario para pasarla bien. Es exactamente como esta en la pagina de airbnb. Super recomendado.
Gracias por todo Claudia!
Claudia y su hijo han sido muy amables y el departamento ideal.
Perfecto !! Excelente departamento, ubicación, anfitriona de 10 !!
Claudia nos recibió muy bien! Es un hermoso apartamento en un muy buen punto de la ciudad.
El lugar super cómodo y la comunicación perfecta, Claudia fue muy amable y atenta. ¡Altamente recomendable! ¡Muchas gracias!

Cada vez que viajo a Buenos Aires voy a lo de Claudia, su de departamento es confortable y muy acogedor; ella es una maravillosa anfitriona. Me siento en casa! El barrio tiene todos lo servicios y la plaza de enfrente le brinda un encanto muy especial.

Claudia nos facilitó la llegada, con sus indicaciones, su recibimiento, y preocupación durante la estadía. Él depto es muy agradable, y está en un barrio muy seguro, entretenido y cercano al transporte.
Todo perfecto

El piso es muy confortable y limpio, Claudia es una excelente anfitriona, nos encantó su trato amable y educado y le agradecemos mucho el habernos confiado su depa. Mi esposo, mi hija y yo pasamos unas bellísimas vacaciones, disfrutamos mucho explorando los restaurantes de la zona y las tiendas.
No me pude quedar mucho tiempo pero fui bien recibido y me ayudar a guardar las maletas mientras viajaba. El apartamento es muy lindo.

El departamento era muy comodo y super bien ubicado. Claudia es muy amable y siempre estuvo a disposicion de lo que pudiera necesitar. Volveria a hospedarme alli en un futuro.

Stella

El apartamento de Claudia está muy bien ubicado y céntrico en la zona de Palermo, con muchos restaurantes y tiendas cerca, al igual que supermecados y el subte. Es muy acogedor y luminoso, nos encantó alojarnos aquí, nos sentimos como en casa. Estaba todo muy limpio y con todo lo necesario paralos días que estuvimos aquí. Claudia es una excelente anfitriona, nos ayudó en todo lo necesario durante nuestra estancia en su apartamento. Realmente recomendamos su casa.

La estadía en el depto de Claudia fue muy agradable. El departarmento es precioso, muy confortable ubicado en una zona cómoda tanto para tareas laborales como para pasear y disfrutar de la ciudad. Claudia es una anfitriona excelente por su hospitalidad  que hace que uno se sienta "como en casa". Gracias Claudia!!

La verdad es que Claudia superó mis expectativas!! Desde el primer momento me hizo sentir en confianza y muy cómodo.  Al final de mi estadía me enfermé un poco de la garganta y Claudia, sin ser parte de su trabajo, me llevó a su casa, ayudo con remedios caseros e información donde me pudiesen atender en caso que no mejorara.  No encuentras a muchas personas en el campo de la hotelería tan humanas.  Tuve muchas suerte de encontrarla.
En cuanto a la Ubicación del departamento no me puedo quejar de nada.  Todo lo que necesité quedaba muy cerca.  Hay restaurantes, pubs, discotecas, farmacias, supermercados, etc. Un sector de la ciudad muy lindo y privilegiado.
El departamento cuenta con todo lo que puedas necesitar.  Es lindo, cómodo, muy confortable, la verdad es que me sentí como en casa.
Todo perfecto, desde la atención, Claudia es muy buena anfitriona y la ubicación INMEJORABLE, en el mejor barrio y el piso muy cuidado.

Excelente mi estadia en la casa de Claudia. Ella se ha portado con nosotros fenomenal, cualquier problema ella estaba ahi para ayudarnos. El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos, muy comodo, muy limpio y muy bien situado. Lo recomiendo 100%!!! Gracias Claudia!
Altamente recomendable, Claudia tiene muy buena onda y el apartamento está muy bueno, confortable, tiene todo lo necesario y está en el mejor lugar de la ciudad. Sin duda vamos a volver.
reviews.response: Gracias Marcelo !!realmente espero verlos de nuevo! besos

reviews.comments: I had a wonderfull weekend in this appartment, excellent location in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in Buenos Aires, clean and tidy. It is a bit noisy in the mornings because it's on the first floor. Claudia, the owner, really kind, helpful and polite.

Claudia was very kind recieving us at her appartment in Palermo. It was great, spacious and very cosy. The balcony was perfect for a galss of wine and a cigarrette. The neighbourhood is great if you want to have a drink, something to eat and full of trendy and cool boutiques. It was a great stay in Claudia's appartment and would definetly stay there again. Totally recomend it!

Nice apartment in great neighbourhood. Apartment itself was nothing special, but spacious enough, clean, had a small kitchen, working wi-fi, proper bed, so all perfectly fine. The real gem is the location. Fantastic within Palermo. All sorts of bars and restaurants nearby, while relatively quiet :). Claudia replies swiftly. Recommended!
Excellent location and easy communication and check-in. No frills, but great place to stay if you plan to be out and about in Palermo.
Very comfortable apartment, great location, clean, perfect spot for a few days in Buenos Aires! Thank you Claudia!

The apartment is in a fantastic part of Palermo Soho: safe, close to everything, but still quiet at night. And conveniently located very close to a couple of larger supermarkets. The a/c and wifi work well, and the bed is comfortable.

Claudia is a terrific host. She was flexible with check-in/out times, offered to let me leave my bags at her place the day I left, and was incredibly responsive (most of her responses came within minutes).  Highly recommended!

I stayed here for 9 nights from 27 Dec to 5 Jan. Wow, you’re not going to go wrong staying here. This property is in the perfect location. So many restaurants, bars, nightclubs, parks etc. This area of town was perfect for me as a solo traveller. And the safest part of Buenos Aires for sure from my experience. Claudia and her son Michael were great, she greeted me at the front door when I arrived, showed me the apartment and explained where all the important things were - ATM’s, laundry, supermarket etc. When I checked out, Claudia was kind enough to let me leave my bags in her apartment as well for the day before my bus that evening. Can’t recommend highly enough. Great price too.

We loved staying in Claudia’s apartment right in the middle of Palermo! The building is so close to amazing bars, restaurants, and shops. And Claudia was very nice and helpful at checkin. We really enjoyed the space and would definitely stay here again.
Claudia is a thoughtful person and replied my questions immediately. Her place is perfectly located among the nicest places in Palermo region. I highly recommend staying at Claudia's place.

The apartment was perfect for us. Placed in an area with lots of great little bars and restaurants, and well placed to explore other parts of BsAs, we felt right at home very quickly. Claudia was a great host - she even helped us book a cab to the airport and made sure we got there. We’ll be back!
Great place!

Comfortable, cozy place in the most lively neighborhood in BA. 15 min walk to bars and clubs at most, and supermarkets and restaurants down the block. Claudia even helped with recommendations for stuff to do. Would stay again for sure.

Claudia was a fantastic host, and was very prompt with all her responses from the moment I booked. The apartment looks exactly like it does in the pictures, and is in a great location close to lots of cafes, pubs, and nightlife (Claudia also gave me some tips on what to do/where to go). Finally when I had to check out, she let me leave my bags at her own apartment because my flight wasn’t until the evening. 

Great experience, I would definitely recommend!
Excellent location. Nice apartment building.
Great location and space. The couch in the living room needs to be upgraded for sleeping purposes. If you don’t need to sleep on it, then it’s a perfect spot.
The host was fantastic! Warm, helpful and made sure i was taken care of. Highly recommend!

Claudia was an amazing host and the Airbnb was perfect. It was clean and very roomy. Claudia provided heaters for us which kept the apartment nice and cozy on the rainy day. The apartment is located in a safe and cute neighborhood with lots of food nearby. Overall, we would highly recommend this Airbnb.

Claudia is very hospital and gives you a warm welcome. She gives you some ins and outs of the city useful for a good start. It was the perfect start of our trip.
Communication was quick and excellent.
Flat is in nice and safe Palermo in front of station for hop on/off bus. Metro is 10 min walk. Some good restaurants are closeby. Appartment has everything you need.
All in all we highly recommend it.

Apartamento de frente a Plaza Armênia, muitos barzinhos, cafés, restaurantes, mercado e fármacia em volta, bairro super gostoso. Faz tudo a pé.
O apartamento é aconchegante, tudo funciona, wifi bom, você pode ter a opção de separar as camas e assim ter 2 de solteiro, o sofá cama é bom acomoda bem 1 pessoa, banheiro bom e com secador. Fomos em 3 pessoas e ficamos muito satisfeitas com a estadia. A Claudia, anfitriã, foi atenciosa e atendeu prontamente nossas necessidades.

Having spent several weeks traveling in shared spaces, it was such a treat to have this well-kept apartment to myself for a weekend. It's in a perfect location (whether you want to eat, or drink, or shop, or just relax in a café) and makes for a pleasant walk to Recoleta. Also: the bed is super comfy. Would definitely consider staying again next time I'm in Bs.As.

I had a wonderful time at Claudia's place! The apartment itself has everything you need, very well kept, clean and cosy even if it gets cold outside at times. I did especially love the balcony. The area was perfect for me, I really enjoyed having both a very vibrant neighborhood and a sense of security at all times day and night. More importantly Claudia and her son are incredibly kind and thoughtful people, very easy to communicate with and helped me with every need I could possibly have, be it my way too early arrival for check in, late staying due to an evening flight, airport transportation and general tips and kindness. Highly recommended!

Location was fantastic. It was two block from a studio where I was working. Can be a little loud because of it's location, but not too much of a problem. The shades block out a lot. This was a minor issue. Overall, well equipped and clean and well managed. I made an error when booking my three week stay. I wanted one more night and forgot to actually book it with AB&B after getting the OK from Claudia. Of course, it was rented on what I thought was to be my last day. Claudia communicated with AB&B very effectively and solved the problem to my total satisfaction. Very professional.
Best value for money in one of the very best locations in Buenos Aires
Not sure I could have stayed at a more perfect place. Location, the apartment, it's cleanliness; were all spectacular. I highly recommend that you stay at Claudia's. She's equally wonderful.

The apartment is greatly located in the middle of palermo. It has all you need and everything works well. Cláudia is always available and she even met me stay free of charge until 19:00 pm the next day, which was highly convenient. If you come for work it can be a little loud as it is a first floor and the location is in the heart of one of the most lively areas in Buenos Aires. If you come for leisure you won't find something with a better location. Highly recommendable. I will come back soon.
Localização espetacular, no melhor de Palermo!!! Cláudia é uma anfitriã super atenciosa e muito prestativa!!!!
Location, location, location. If you're looking to spend time in one of the best parts of Palermo, this is an ideal spot. Claudia was very friendly too. The Sunday market here was great.
Cláudia mora ali perto, fácil acesso.

The apartment is located near everything you need: supermarket, kioskos, cafes, all kinds of restaurants, bakeries, nice shops. It is very easy to get to other parts of town as the metro is close by and there are several buses to chose from.
The apartment was very comfy and clean, the bed clothing is high quality. The only thing I regret is that I only spend three days there!
Regarding Claudia, she's the sweetest person! Our communication was great ever since I booked the the apartment. She's very kind and was always available. She gave me great tips on how to get around Palermo and also helped me a lot when I needed to get to the airport.

This place is in such a great location, so close to all the bars, restaurants and shops. It's about a 10 minute walk from the subway. The flat itself has everything you need for a comfortable stay. The kitchen is a little dated. The only other thing is that the street is very loud at night due to all the bars in the area.

Claudia's place was great and in an amazing location! It's right on the corner of Plaza Armenia, which is surrounded by a lot of bars, cafes, and boutique shops. The apartment itself was great and the check-in/out process was very easy! During our time in Buenos Aires, there was a strike which caused delays to our flight back to Rio. Claudia went above and beyond to try and help us find another place and even offered her couch for us to stay! All worked out, but it was so amazing to meet someone like Claudia. Look forward to visiting again soon!
Five stars - best airbnb I´ve ever stayed and would love to come back again. Big hug Claudia!

Claudia's place is in a very walkable spot close to tons of coffee shops, restaurants, bars and stores. Claudia is very hospitable and lovely. She's responsive to messages and will make you feel right at home the minute you arrive.

I had a wonderful stay at Claudia's place and would definitely recommend it. It's in a great, safe neighborhood right on the corner of a park, the apartment was just as promised and very comfortable, and Claudia was very easy to communicate with and accommodating. Thank you Claudia!

Probably my favourite place I've ever stayed with AirBnB.
Great apartment! Amazing value! Light, bright, clean, good wifi. Perfect location for Palermo. 
Only have good things to say about it!!! 
And Claudia and her sons seem very nice too. Quick to respond. 
Would recommend

I was really happy to stay at Claudia's Apartment again! It is well located in the heart of Palermo Soho, equipped with all you need, clean, cosy and fast Wifi! Claudia is always very helpful and made my stay unforgettable. Thank you very much.
A lovely apartment in a central location.  My stay was fantastic, and Claudia was a really great host.  Would recommend!

I cannot say a single negative thing about Claudia or her apartment. She is the epitome of excellence when it comes to hospitality and the reason why Airbnb is so incredible. Beyond that, the apartment is cozy, but more than enough space for 1-2 people, and in an awesome neighborhood with incredible restaurants, shopping and bars. I absolutely recommend staying here if you have the chance. It was my favorite neighborhood in Buenos Aires by far, and Claudia made staying there even better.
Amazing place and amazing host, love this place, definitely will stay here if i return to Argentina!

Our stay at Claudia's Apartment was excellent! Located in the heart of Palermo Soho, near to nice Restaurants and Shops and all walking distance. The apartment was clean, had a small Balcony to enjoy the warm nights of the summer and is equipped with the basics to feel at home. Claudia was a great host, helped us with our questions and made our stay in Buenos Aires unforgettable. We're coming back at the end of our Trip!

This cozy appartment at the Plaza Armenia can be highly recommended. Claudia - the host - made me feel at home immediately.
The appartment features everything you need from a home base, including a good-hearted concierge that helps you out with tips and directions.
Lying in the heart of Palermo, many cafés, restaurants, bars, libraries, shops, concert and dancing venues can be reached by foot. Bus, subte (metro) and taxi connections are handy too.
A lovely place to stay!

This apartment is great. The location is awesome in the trendy neighbourhood. You can easily walk around lovely Palermo Soho and spend good time. If you want to see more about the city the Hop-on-Hop-off buses stop 20 metres from the apartment. The apartment was super clean and it has everything you might need. Claudia is a lovely host she even helped me to get a taxi to the airport at 5 am. Thank you so much.

Claudia's apartment is very clean and has everything you might need, there is a nice little balcony. There are restaurants all around and a very nice park acrossthe street.
I stayed there with my sister and my 8 months old baby, I asked Claudiaif she had a crib and she said she was going to try to get one. When we arrived she had purchased a brand new crib mattress, it worked great.
There is a key to get in the building it feels very safe
The check in and out are super easy.
I would definitely stay there again
ottimo

Claudia's place was so charming, so clean and in the absolute best location. She was so kind and so quick with responding to anything we needed. Palermo Soho is the perfect location to stay and I would highly recommend Caudia's apartment. Amazing experience!

We had a great stay. Miguel, Claudias son, gave us a warm welcome and told us everything we needed to know. Everything was easy and uncomplicated. Very good communication. Miguel cared a lot about us and was always available for questions. We would come back anytime. We can definitely recommend this place.

Minha hospedagem no apartamento da Claudia foi incrível. Desde antes de chegar em Buenos Aires ela já estava em contato comigo preocupada em nos receber bem e cuidar dos detalhes da chegada. Sua atenção em nos receber com o auxílio do seu filho (que inclusive nos passou dicas preciosas sobre o bairro e a cidade) foi formidável, além de toda atenção durante os dias que passamos em Buenos Aires. O apartamento é ótimo, limpo, organizado, com tudo funcionando em perfeito estado, em excelente localização, acesso muito privilegiado (perto de pontos de ônibus, o metrô não fica longe também, muitos bares e restaurantes, táxis à todo o momento) além da segurança do bairro. Claudia nos recebeu muito bem, sempre pronta a nos atender quando precisávamos de qualquer informação ou (URL HIDDEN) certeza serei seu hóspede mais vezes quando for à Buenos Aires. Recomendo!

Super nettes Apartment in meiner Lieblingsgegend in Buenos Aires!
Sauberkeit top, Lage top, Claudias Empfang top, sehr hilfsbereit über meine Erwartung hinaus!
Jederzeit gerne wieder!!!

Claudia is wonderful and so communicative. She made sure to connect with me ahead of my trip and coordinate when I was arriving so she could be there to personally give me the key and show me around. The apartment is perfect for a solo traveler or couple and in a fantastic location for food and nightlife.
Very warm and friendly

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay with Claudia. The apartment is as described and is a better value for money than other apartments in the area. Claudia is a fantastic host - fast and reliable communication and also a fun conversation partner.

Location and apartment were great! Lots of restaurants and shopping nearby, and close to public transportation. Claudia was willing to help with anything and just a few houses down if we were to need her. Great stay!

This apartment was the perfect base for our Buenos Aires vacation. Its location on the square is super convenient -- we were able to walk to many things that we wanted to do (shopping, restaurants, great cafes, Recoleta), and when we needed to take cabs, being on the square made it very simple to give directions! The apartment was also quite comfortable, even though we spent an entire week there; it felt very home-like. Claudia and her son were very welcoming and flexible with our arrival time and made sure that we had everything we needed. I would STRONGLY recommend staying here!

We stayed about a week at Claudia's apartment and we couldn't have asked for anything more. House was clean, enough space to relax, watch tv, and cook. It was also right in the middle of everything, at the most an hour or maybe 2 hour walk to see everything in the city. 
Best of all, Claudia was immensely helpful and was able to suggest some very fun things to do based on our time and budget, and also accommodated our late check out time, even calling a cab for us when we realized we were planning on going to the wrong bus terminal and would have missed our bus otherwise. Thanks so much Claudia!

The apartment is in a great location for discovering Buenos Aires and is situated in a very cool area. Claudia is a welcoming host who is available for advice and supplying any items you need for the apartment. V clean, simple and light.
Nice place. Claudia was very friendly and helpful.
